channel.title: Kicksecure 18 for Qubes R4.3 - Major Release - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
Testers only!
# Download
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Qubes/Install
# Upgrade
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using by performing a release upgrade.
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Release_Upgrade
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Release_Upgrade_17_to_18
----
# Availability and Kicksecure for Qubes Support: Qubes R4.2 versus Qubes R4.3?
* **Qubes R4.2:** **Kicksecure 18 unavailable.** Kicksecure 18 won't be available for Qubes R4.2. * **Release status:** Even though Qubes R4.3 is only available as a **r**elease **c**andidate (RC) at the time of writing, * **Expected release:** A stable release of Qubes R4.3 (and Kicksecure 18) is probably not far away. * **Upgrade recommendation:** Kicksecure 17 users on Qubes R4.2 are encouraged to consider upgrading to Kicksecure 18 on Qubes R4.3 as soon as possible. * **Maintenance situation:** Kicksecure 18 is what developers are using and where the development focus is. It comes with much newer packages. Kicksecure is a small project and does not have a dedicated team for oldstable support. Therefore, oldstable support is maintained as a side project. More details: [decide availability of Kicksecure and Whonix 18 (Debian trixie based) on Qubes R4.2 versus R4.3 #10219](https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/10219) * **Qubes R4.3:** Kicksecure 18 is available.
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Contribute
# Changelog
Same as https://forums.kicksecure.com/t/kicksecure-18-0-7-5-major-release-upgrade-testers-wanted/1375

item.title: Kicksecure 18 for Qubes R4.3 - Major Release - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Testers only!

Download

Kicksecure – 29 Nov 25

Kicksecure for Qubes

Using Kicksecure-Qubes

Upgrade

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using by performing a release upgrade.

Kicksecure – 1 Dec 25

Release Upgrade

What is a Release Upgrade?

Kicksecure – 1 Dec 25

Release Upgrade Kicksecure 17 to Kicksecure 18

How to Release Upgrade from Kicksecure 17 to Kicksecure 18

Availability and Kicksecure for Qubes Support: Qubes R4.2 versus Qubes R4.3?

  • Qubes R4.2: Kicksecure 18 unavailable. Kicksecure 18 won’t be available for Qubes R4.2.
    • Release status: Even though Qubes R4.3 is only available as a release candidate (RC) at the time of writing,
    • Expected release: A stable release of Qubes R4.3 (and Kicksecure 18) is probably not far away.
    • Upgrade recommendation: Kicksecure 17 users on Qubes R4.2 are encouraged to consider upgrading to Kicksecure 18 on Qubes R4.3 as soon as possible.
    • Maintenance situation: Kicksecure 18 is what developers are using and where the development focus is. It comes with much newer packages. Kicksecure is a small project and does not have a dedicated team for oldstable support. Therefore, oldstable support is maintained as a side project. More details: decide availability of Kicksecure and Whonix 18 (Debian trixie based) on Qubes R4.2 versus R4.3 #10219
  • Qubes R4.3: Kicksecure 18 is available.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!

Please Donate!

Kicksecure – 10 Oct 24

Donating to Kicksecure
